name: Mad Bomber
description:
Mad Bomber is a fast game where you move a stack of buckets at the bottom of the screen to catch the bombs a mad bomber drops from the top. They need to be caught and extinguished in the buckets before they reach the ground. A bucket is removed when that happens until none are left. The game has a single-player mode and a two-player mode for both cooperative and competitive gameplay.

The game is a clone of Kaboom!
alsoFor: BeOS, GP2X, Linux, Macintosh, Maemo, Palm OS, Wii, Windows | Combined View
